This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"constructor":{"details":"Constructor del contrato","params":{"euroTokenAddress":"Direcci\u00f3n del contrato EuroToken","initialOwner":"Direcci\u00f3n que ser\u00e1 el admin inicial (puede otorgar roles)"}},"getPurchase(string)":{"details":"Obtener los detalles de una compra por purchaseId","params":{"purchaseId":"ID de la compra"},"returns":{"_0":"Purchase Detalles de la compra"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. bf9aa6f320a8b","dweb:/ipfs/QmarDJ5hZEgBtCmmrVzEZWjub9769eD686jmzb2XpSU1cM"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/ERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2d9dc2fe26180f74c11c13663647d38e259e45f95eb88f57b61d2160b0109d3e","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://81233d1f98060113d9922180bb0f14f8335856fe9f339134b09335e9f678c377","dweb:/ipfs/QmWh6R35SarhAn4z2wH8SU456jJSYL2FgucfTFgbHJJN4E"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8891738ffe910f0cf2da09566928589bf5d63f4524dd734fd9cedbac3274dd5c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://971f954442df5c2ef5b5ebf1eb245d7105d9fbacc7386ee5c796df1d45b21617","dweb:/ipfs/QmadRjHbkicwqwwh61raUEapaVEtaLMcYbQZWs9gUkgj3u"]},"src/IEuroToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0x52864055b459054623143be1c6cfbb0d3767c05fab6b962a9031a02bf5000abd","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://33e364e9cdfa89b612ee4c32925277a6e85f6612f13f33a670a9a93036097619","dweb:/ipfs/QmQbXHvNdbpdTJ1PQ7KyYXJ9LXkXKaSFxMs1cCYiByxbed"]},"src/StablecoinPurchase.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0573fa57837a11733f5d0e3fd67913c028eb9274df760586ade0b8b6c6ed9f46","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1b0527629932565ad8937b6bdc5ad696132dab38f291830b17d3ca60da98c7b6","dweb:/ipfs/QmUPAHfeXMFAxLoCzWPDcjbKVqkTE1YLxtZy5815Q6ah8n"]}},"version":1}

params.initialOwner: Direccin que ser el admin inicial (puede otorgar roles)

getPurchase(string).details: Obtener los detalles de una compra por purchaseId

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

getTotalPurchases().details: Obtener el nmero total de compras procesadas

getUserPurchases(address).details: Obtener todas las compras de un usuario

returns._0: Purchase[] Array de compras del usuario

grantPurchaserRole(address).details: Funcin para otorgar rol PURCHASER_ROLE (solo admin)

params.account: Direccin a la que se otorga el rol

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

isPurchaseProcessed(string).details: Verificar si una compra ya fue procesada

returns._0: bool true si ya fue procesada, false en caso contrario

purchaseTokens(string,address,uint256).details: Funcin principal para comprar tokens despus de un pago exitoso en Stripe

params.amountEur: Cantidad en euros pagada (en centavos, ej: 10000 = 100.00 EUR)
params.buyer: Direccin del comprador que recibir los tokens
params.purchaseId: ID nico de la compra (paymentIntentId de Stripe) - previene duplicados

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokePurchaserRole(address).details: Funcin para revocar rol PURCHASER_ROLE (solo admin)

params.account: Direccin a la que se revoca el rol

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

purchaseTokens(string,address,uint256).notice: Solo direcciones con PURCHASER_ROLE pueden ejecutar esta funcinEl backend debe validar el pago en Stripe antes de llamar esta funcin1 EUR = 1 EURT (equivalencia 1:1)Los tokens tienen 6 decimales, entonces 1 EURT = 10^6 unidades base
